what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Hypertonia ?,NINDS supports research on brain and spinal cord disorders that can cause hypertonia. The goals of this research are to learn more about how the nervous system adapts after injury or disease and to find ways to prevent and treat these disorders.,NINDS,Hypertonia
